message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $15000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $14000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know promptly so we can finalize the transaction.
